LanguageData.ProperShotguns.ShotgunDamageRounding_Ran: Pellet damage will randomly be rounded up or down depending on decimal value - 3.7 has a 70% chance of being rounded up to 4, and a 30% chance of being rounded down to 3.
LanguageData.ProperShotguns.ShotgunDamageRounding_Sta: Pellet damage will follow standard rounding rules - down if decimal value is less than 0.5, otherwise up.
LanguageData.ProperShotguns.ShotgunDamageRounding_Flo: Pellet damage will always be rounded down.
LanguageData.ProperShotguns.ShotgunDamageRounding_Cei: Pellet damage will always be rounded up.
